title: Mailvox: Yes, how about them
author: VD
content_html:
Dungy is the MAN could work on his timing:

How ’bout dem COLTS!!!!

Detroit bound baby!!!

Try to look at the silver lining… Detroit in February isn’t exactly the nicest place in the world.

UPDATE: That may have been the worst call I’ve seen since the Drew Pearson pass interference non-call. Polamalu clearly intercepted the ball, then fumbled it. I have no dog in this hunt, but I’ll definitely be going against the Colts now. It’s either an incredibly stupid rule of which I’m unaware or a horrendous call.
content_text:
Dungy is the MAN could work on his timing:
How ’bout dem COLTS!!!!
Detroit bound baby!!!
Try to look at the silver lining… Detroit in February isn’t exactly the nicest place in the world.
UPDATE: That may have been the worst call I’ve seen since the Drew Pearson pass interference non-call.  Polamalu clearly intercepted the ball, then fumbled it.  I have no dog in this hunt, but I’ll definitely be going against the Colts now.  It’s either an incredibly stupid rule of which I’m unaware or a horrendous call.
